name: Flex Defence
description:
Reverse tower defence where you control population and evolution.

The game is made for ScoreSpace Jam #24. 

Your goal is to make your population survive for as long as possible, each round changing the characteristics of a new generation.

You get a score point for each surviving dancer and a great bonus for each round end.  Survive as long as possible and get to the very top of the leaderboard. 

The leaderboard was created with LootLocker.

//Some bugs may appear, just start a new game. //Game balance is not ideal, but we try. //Post in a comment your ideas for a balance patch.
